definitions: A natural liking or sympathy for someone or something.
A close similarity between two things.
The spontaneous or natural inclination to unite with, or enter into a close relationship with, something else.
The force by which atoms are held together in compounds.
examples: He has a great affinity for the outdoors.
There is a strong affinity between the two cultures.
The drug has an affinity for certain receptors.
Their affinity was established through marriage.
The chemical affinity of oxygen for hydrogen.
